旬.definition: ten days; ten years; full period

旬始.definition: comet from Saturn, traditionally described as yellow; evil omen

旬朔.definition: ten days; one month; short period

旬課.definition: test every ten day; periodic deadline

旬輸月送.definition: pay every ten days, give tribute every month (idiom); incessant and ever more complicated demands

旬邑.definition: Xunyi County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi

旬邑縣.definition: Xunyi County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi

旬首.definition: start of a ten day period
